prompt: Subject: Eleven (female, early 20s) and the male love interest (early 20s). Context: Bookstore doorway with soft ambient light, transitioning from indoor to outdoor. Action: She rushes forward, calling out; he stops at the doorway, turns around in surprise, their eyes meeting. Style: Warm, romantic cinematic aesthetic with a slightly desaturated initial look. Composition: Wide shot expanding to intimate medium framing of the two. Ambiance: Soft, warm ambient light, bookstore noise fading to focus on their emotional interaction.
camera_movement: Wide shot with a slow push-in
